CustomField.description: Used in General Approval Form workflow
CustomField.formula: 'This application applies for security class confidentially: C-SC1, availability: A-SC1, integrity: I-SC1 (see Security Class Guidance). It is not allowed to use this application for processes which contain security class (confidentiality, availability, integrity) SC2 and SC3. Archiving period: 15 years (starts 6 month after the request is closed). Attachments in the workflow are not encrypted.'
CustomField.label: Usage Agreement
